name: Glasses Galore
overview:
Glasses Galore is your premier source for all your eyewear needs. We carry all different brands of prescription and non-prescription glasses and sunglasses.

OPTICAL BENEFIT PLAN We are pleased to offer business and organizations a benefit plan by which they can provide eye care benefits to their employees or members… at NO COST to the employee or organization! OUR OPTICAL BENEFIT PLAN OFFERS: 10% discount on professional services 15%discount on eyeglasses 10% discount on disposable contacts Free delivery of your eyewear to your office Free micro-fiber cleaning cloth Free LIFETIME supply of anti-static lens cleaner 1 hour service on eyewear and contacts (whenever possible) Free tune-ups , ultra-sonic cleaning, and any adjustments or minor repairs.
